name: project mts
description:
Project M.T.S

A Game by Jayden "Yoush" Brooks for DATT 3300 (Lab 2)

design doc

Project mts is a prototype game where you stake around and deliver mail to some mailboxes that are certainly out of place. Use your staking tricks and rail-grinding to quickly move through the level  and make sure the mail is tossed, you lil scallywag you.

 

Mechanics and Controls:
  • WASD/Left stick to move
  • Mouse/Right stick to move camera
  • Space/A (on Xbox layout) to Jump
  • Press jump while in the air to do a spin-jump
  • LT/Shift to go into aim mode
  • RT/Left click to toss mail while aiming
  • tossing mail costs 15 energy, recover energy by grinding on rails
  • you can also press RT/Left click while near a mailbox to deliver it by hand
  • You're given a rank at the end of the level based on time, mailboxes hit, and score. try to get a Perfect Rank!!!
Known Issues
  • The web export has some issues with audio delay and world environment stuff. Play the Windows or Linux executable if you can
  • You can get stuck behind rails, If you ever do, press F1 to toggle debug noclip flight
  • Q/E: Z axis
  • A/D: X axis
  • W/S: Y axis
Tools and asset credits:
  • Made with the Godot Engine
  • Level Made with Trenchbroom and Qodot
  • Level Textures from https://little-martian.itch.io/retro-texture-pack
  • Player model from https://skfb.ly/osIqp
  • Song used: "Reach Out" by 2mello
  • Some sound effects from LISA and Pizza Tower
  • Fonts from https://somepx.itch.io/
